name: create-electron-vite
description: Boilerplate for Electron, agnostic to package manager, to start applications based on Vue, React or "vanilla" typescript. React template is delivered with SCSS, Vue and vanilla with regular CSS.

name: vitawind
description: A scaffolding for projects with tailwindcss v3. Agnostic to the package manager. Has the templates with Vite for Vue and React (javascript and typescript), also supports create-react-app and Angular CLI.

name: create-vite
description:
Default scaffolder for Vite. List of currently support templates: vanilla, vanilla-ts, vue, vue-ts, react, react-ts, react-swc, react-swc-ts, preact, preact-ts, lit, lit-ts, svelte, svelte-ts.
Also support community templates via degit.

name: create-vite-app
description:
Flexible and beautiful interactive CLI which allows to choose and switch a lot of packages and templates. It also includes a bunch of optional plugins to support JSX, legacy browser, PWA, to visualize rollup plugins and others. 
Be ready to cross over comments and untranslated phrases in Chinese.

name: nx
description:
Nx is a powerful open-source build system with first class monorepo support that provides tools and techniques for enhancing developer productivity, optimizing CI performance, and maintaining code quality.

Nx includes a feature of a code generation with a looot of options via plugins. It may support even .Net!

name: vite-reactts-eslint-prettier
usage:
npx degit TheSwordBreaker/vite-reactts-eslint-prettier project-name
cd project-name
yarn install
yarn dev

name: vitamin
description: Opinionated Vite starter template. Includes Tailwind CSS v3 with a basic reset for form styles and Prettier plugin to sort classes, unit and e2e testing, PWA, GitHub actions and deploy to vercel.com.
usage:
npx degit wtchnm/Vitamin#main my-app
cd my-app
pnpm install

name: react-vite-admin
description:
This Starter utilizes React, Recoil, React Query, React Hooks, Typescript, Axios And Vite.
It seems pretty raw, contains example with an unused code and packages.
usage:
git clone https://github.com/ychengcloud/react-vite-admin.git
 cd react-vite-admin
 yarn install

name: vite-template-react
description: It really resemble vite default project. Official description: "A Create React App-like template."
usage:
git clone https://github.com/SafdarJamal/vite-template-react.git
cd vite-template-react
rm -rf .git && git init && npm init
git add .
git commit -m commit-name
npm i
npm start
